text: Au gu hili aga hunu dama daane i godou dama bolo e hai nia soukohp, mo hunu dama daane belee hai nia Nasarait.2.11 Nasarait: tangada dela e hagamodu ang gi God bolo ia ga hagalee inu nia waini mo nia wai haga gii ala i golo, mo di tuu nia ngaahulu dono libogo, mo di bili gi tuaidina tangada made. (Numbers 6.1-8)
